question: You live close to a restaurant and have recently been disturbed by the noise coming from the restaurant in the evenings. Write a letter to owner of the restaurant. In your letter.1. explain why you find the noise disturbing2. suggest a way to solve the problem,3. explain what you will do If the problem is not solved.
text: I am writing to inform you about the noise pollution in your hotel. I reside on the third floor in the same building where your hotel locates

I work as a software engineer in one of the leading MNC organisations. After completion of my work and reach flat at 4:30 PM. I have seen so many people visit your restaurant during this timeframe, and you play some music to entertain them. Music from the restaurant is too much loud and disturbing my sleeping schedule and causing health issues.
Because of the noisy music, most of the tenants in the building were disturbed.
I request you to put the speakers inside the hotel or turn down the volume. This will help you to resolve the issues.
If you failed to take immediate action on this, I will register a complaint against your hotel to the Human Welfare Department of California.
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
